Text:
To anyone who might think this is fake: 

I am a member of KaOsKrew. As gansuk didnt have time to add this, I am adding it on his behalf.
kaos admins are busy atm, thanx pb for adding it for us before anybody else did.
This is the Source SDK 2007 or Black Mesa? PT-BR

@Alexhades

I think it's the Game Black Mesa.
Is anything else required? Source Engine? Steam?
nothing is required, its all in there. simply install and play.
nothing is needed, just install and play.
somebodys angry with the - button lmao

Whenever I try to run the game, I get an error messag sayig "Setup file 'gameinfo.txt' doesn't exist in subdiretory 'hl2'. Check your -game parameter or VCONFIG setting". Does anyone know how to fix it and get hegame running?
Thank you PirateBoy & gansuk! Awesome game - timeless. I like this kind of compression, it saves a lot of bandwidth. Wonder why the heck others dont. KaOs rocks.
THX KaOs. KaOs is the best. Thx PirateBoy. Game work perfectly. Just follow the instructions.
